title: Condition
description: A reusable logical expression evaluated against request context (time, location, user attributes, resource state) to determine when a SecurityPolicy rule applies. Distinct from AccessCondition, which is a concrete field+operator+value predicate composed inside a PolicyRule condition chain.

operator.description: Comparison operator for the condition expression, aligned with XACML MatchType values.

evaluationType.description: When the condition is evaluated: at build time, at policy load, or at runtime during access enforcement.
